name: Neutron Charge
description:
Hello, I am a new Unity developer and for the past 1 week I've been trying to complete my first proper mobille game. I had to learn a lot from my god and saviour Brackeys, Dani and other sourcers online. Let me know what you guys think. I would love to get some tips on how to further improve my game and ofcourse the bugs that you guys will encounter :2

The build here is for Windows and its a very early version of the game with low amount of content but the jist of it is implemented. I would like to release this on mobille eventaully on the Google Play Store for free.

PS: I've left the implementation of my UI for later so there is no Exit button yet. Use Alt + F4 (proffesional developer here)
